mapper.insert: insert into thsda_context_aware_hist(aware_group_id, cmid, ciid, start_time, work_result, cuser) values (#{aware_group_id}, #{cmid}, #{ciid}, #{start_time}, #{work_result}, #{cuser})
mapper.select: update thsda_context_aware_hist set aware_group_id=#{aware_group_id}, finish_time=#{finish_time}, work_result=#{work_result}, uuser = #{uuser}, udate = now() where cmid = #{cmid} and ciid = #{ciid} and start_time = #{start_time}
